simbench

collision simulator benchmark for robotics applications: RaiSim vs Bullet vs ODE vs MuJoCo vs Dart

View on GitHub

ANYmal test

ANYmal test is for testing articulated robot system. In this test, the 18 DOF quadruped robot ANYmal is feedback-controlled to stand on the flat ground.

The test focuses on:

  1. Speed of the articulated system (multibody system with revolute joints) simulation
  2. Scalability of the simulators

Test scenario

Results
